title: Batman Movie Starts Over - Kinda Funny Morning Show 07.13.17
description:
Thanks to Me Undies for sponsoring this episode. Go to MeUndies.com/Morning

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.

so here's let's get into some of them reading through them it's easy to see why and what is arguably most level ahead of his email sent in July 21st 2010 Darabont tells an exec a creative executive AMC whom he considers an ally to stop invoking the writer's room in their exchanges quote there is no writer's room I am the writer room the failings of the show's writing staff and crew and in particular the camera operators are repeated themes of his rants in the same email he singles out one pair of writers as quote lazy and quote overpaid con artist after receiving what he felt was a woefully subpar script from a pair of writers Darabont tells Executives quote if it were up to me I'd have not only fired them I'd have hunted them down and killed them with a brick then gone and burned their houses down quote I told those guys at least half a dozen times D mon continues why don't they listen to me when I tell them what uh the way to do it it's in one ear and out the
